idea-plugin.name: Fusion 360 Scripting
idea-plugin.description:
This plugin provides support for developing Fusion 360 python scripts. It allows you to directly launch and debug scripts in Fusion 360, similarly to the bundled Spyder IDE. This plugin requires an add-on to be installed in Fusion 360. See https://github.com/JesusFreke/fusionIdea/blob/master/README.md for more information.

Features:

  • Adds a "Fusion 360 Python Script" run configuration type
  • "Run in Fusion 360" action launches the selected script in Fusion 360
  • "Debug in Fusion 360" action launches the select script in Fusion 360, and attaches the debugger, so that it stops at any breakpoints that have been set. Once stopped, you can do all the usual debug thing. stepping, inspecting state, etc. It also redirects any stdout and stdin from your script to the status window.
  • Adds "Run in Fusion 360" and "Debug in Fusion 360" items to the context menu, for easy access
  • Supports "Attach to Process" to attach to a Fusion 360 process for debugging, without launching a script
  • Add fusion 360 support as a framework when creating a new module
  • Add fusion 360 support to an existing module via a Facet
  • Automatically adds the Fusion 360 APIs as a module dependency, so you get autocomplete and api documentation
